summary: Prevents dragons from becoming an skeleton, keeping its flesh instead of it burning away when Dragon-born approaches.
descriptionHtml:
[center]If you have Questions/Problems, contact me via Nexus messaging system.


[b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/932?]Skyrim Special Edition - Dragon Remains[/url][/size]
[/b]Dragon Remains now for Special Edition!


COMPATIBLE WITH ALL DLC NOW[/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img]

[/url][b][size=5]Don't forget to Endorse and tell your friends of this mod![/size][/b][/center]

[size="7"]What does this do?:[/size]

Prevents dragons from becoming an skeleton. but nothing else you still get the soul of the dragon, This does not change textures models or anything. it simple changes how a dragon dies. There will be no compatibility issues.

This mod would be good addition as those who use different dragon models like MLP and mancho dragon. this will hide dragon skeleton and keep their skin.


[size="7"]Compatibility:[/size]

This mod only modifys 2 scripts
MQKillDragonScript.pex
MQKillDragonScript.psc

only possible incompatibility is if another mod modified the same files.

If you see bugs message them to me and I will do my best to help.


[size="7"]Uninstall:manual[/size]
GoTo: C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonskyrimDataScripts
Delete: MQKillDragonScript.pex
GoTo: C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonskyrimDataScriptsSource
Delete: MQKillDragonScript.psc
Done.



[img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/5lxv5v.jpg[/img]
author: Strazytski
